accessToken.invalidVerification: Have been an error during the verification of the access token
accessToken.resend: The access token has expired, a new one has been sent to your email

verificationToken.invalidVerification: Have been an error during the verification of the verification token
verificationToken.resend: The verification token has expired, a new one has been sent to your email

forgotPasswordToken.invalid: Forgot Password Token provided is invalid
forgotPasswordToken.invalidVerification: Have been an error during the verification of the forgot password token
forgotPasswordToken.resend: The Forgot Password token has expired, a new one has been sent to your email

refreshToken.invalidVerification: Have been an error during the refresh token of the refresh token
refreshToken.resend: The Refresh token has expired, a new one has been sent to your email

mfaOtpToken.invalidVerification: Have been an error during the refresh token of the OTP token
mfaOtpToken.resend: The OTP token has expired, a new one has been sent to your email

mfaAuthToken.invalidVerification: Have been an error during the refresh token of the Auth token
mfaAuthToken.resend: The Auth token has expired, a new one has been sent to your email
